meanings.sent1: The punkie buzzed around my head.
meanings.sent2: I got a bite from a punkie while hiking.
meanings.sent3: The punkie seemed to enjoy annoying everyone at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The punkie's bite felt like a tiny needle.
meanings.sent5: Watch out for punkies near the lake; they can be pesky.

meanings.sent1: I saw a punkie crawling on the picnic table.
meanings.sent2: Don't let the punkie ruin your outdoor fun.
meanings.sent3: The punkie kept bothering the campers by the fire.
meanings.sent4: The punkie's presence was as irritating as a buzzing fly.
meanings.sent5: Swatting away punkies became a constant task during the barbecue.

meanings.sent1: That punkie always plays pranks on his friends.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a punkie and cause trouble in class.
meanings.sent3: The little punkie thought it was funny to hide everyone's pens.
meanings.sent4: Her brother can be a real punkie when he wants attention.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous punkie giggled after pulling off his latest prank.
